summary_gpt: Dabur India Limited has incorporated a new step-down wholly owned subsidiary in the UK, named DABUR UK TRADING LIMITED, effective from April 17, 2025. This move expands Dabur's international presence through its subsidiary structure.

Dabur India Limited has published a notice in newspapers regarding the loss of share certificates by some shareholders, in compliance with SEBI regulations. The filing is a formal communication related to shareholding documentation.
